Pause Sequence: With this action you can pause a playing sequence. You supply the sequence element ID (as returned by the action Create Sequence), and the action will pause it playing.
The ID of the sequence element to pause.
The above action block code checks to see if a global variable is true. If it is then the sequence element referenced in the variable "my_seq" is paused, otherwise it is set to play.
